name: 葉世川
objective: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
schedule:
週次
1. Waves
2. Thermodynamics
3. Coulomb's Law
4. Finding the Electric Field
5. Finding the Electric Field
6. Finding the Electric Potential
7. Capacitors and Capacitance
8. Ohm's Law
9.期中考
10. Circuit Theory
11. Magnetic Force
12. Current-Produced Magnetic Fields
13. Inductance
14. Alternating Fields and Current
15. Maxwell's Equations, Models of Magnetism
16. Nature of Electromagnetic Waves
17. Geometric Optics
18.期末考
scorePolicy: 平時40%, 期中考 30%, 期末考 30%
materials:
Textbook :
Fundamental of Physics (D. Halliday et al. 9th  Edition)
